message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love! I'm asking for $110 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value of the item, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $90 is a good offer, I need to be closer to $100 to make this work.  Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. Please let me know if this works for you.
